apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this couple emoji features two figures with medium-dark skin tones, their bodies subtly shaded with Apple's characteristic 3D glossiness and smooth gradients. They stand close together, their forms defined by soft rounded edges, and a vibrant, glowing heart hovers between them, radiating warmth and affection. This rendering emphasizes connection and shared love, with realistic lighting highlighting the gentle embrace and the positive emotional bond, making it a powerful symbol of romantic relationships and deep affection when used in messages on Apple devices.
